players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We should vote her out!"
You: "Diana, you're just trying to deflect suspicion onto me. I think you're the mafioso!"
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate someone else? I think you're making this up to frame me. Let's vote for her instead."
Charlie: "I'm not the mafioso, and I don't think Diana is either. I believe Bob was killed by the mafioso. We should focus our investigation on Alice as she has a motive to kill Bob."
Diana: "Trust my investigation; Alice is the mafioso. Her defensiveness proves it. Charlie, let's vote her out together!"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
